name: One Hero (Fermatt)
description:
It's time to fight! A great empire is about to strike and the strongest and most valuable fighters are here to... Wait... THERE'S ONLY ONE SOLDIER?!

Even though you can't survive more than one hit, you want to fight for what's right!!

Don't worry, each time you fail, you become stronger!

No, really. You literally fight with twice the power!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Right click- Attack

(DO NOT LEFT CLICK! Trust me)

Assets used in this game:
https://opengameart.org/content/3-melee-sounds

https://opengameart.org/content/swords-pack
https://www.kenney.nl/assets (Kinda forgot to add this one to the credits... Sorry)

If I forgot to add an asset let me know! I'm kinda tired and it is possible that I missed one or two...

THANK YOU FOR PLAYING!!
